{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24348v1", "title": "On the unitarity and modularity of ribbon tensor categories associated
  with affine Lie algebras", "summary": "We study the unitarity and modularity of ribbon tensor categories derived
from simple affine Lie algebras, via their associated quantum groups. Based on
numerical calculations, and assuming two conjectures, we provide the complete
picture for which values of $q$ these ribbon tensor categories are
(pseudo-)unitary and for which values of $q$ they are modular. We compare our
results with the extensive rigorous results appearing in the literature,
finding complete agreement. For the cases that do not appear in the literature,
we complete the picture.", "main_category": "math.QA", "categories": "math.QA", "published": "2025-03-31T17:32:29Z"}
